text: Alexandra Borbély (born 4 September 1986) is a Slovakian Hungarian theater and film actress acting in Hungarian films, notable for her role of Mária in the film On Body and Soul. == Biography == She was born in Nitra (then part of Czechoslovakia), and has two siblings: younger brother Dávid and sister Dominika. Borbély graduated from a high school in Komárno and from the Academy of Performing Arts in Bratislava, and subsequently went to Budapest to study acting. Since her graduation in 2012 from the University of Theatre and Film Arts, she works at the József Katona Theater in Budapest. In 2017 she won the European Actress award at the European Film Awards for her performance in On Body and Soul. == Filmography == * Swing (2014) * On Body and Soul (2017) ==References== ==External links== * Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Hungarian film actresses Category:Hungarian stage actresses Category:European Film Award for Best Actress winners Category:People from Nitra Category:Hungarians in Slovakia
title: Alexandra Borbély
